changelog.title: BlackLogics v1.0
changelog.description:
Welcome to the initial version of BlackLogics! Experience a fresh start with all features streamlined for optimal performance.

Highlighted Features:
- Complete support for Java 1.9, 10, and 11 in project compilation.
- Added syntax highlighting for Kotlin and XML files.
- Auto-install and launch of projects using root access.
- Enhanced user experience with improved dialogs, faster performance, and a sleek interface.

Fixes:
- Resolved compatibility issues with Firebase and Google Maps libraries.
- Fixed various app crashes and improved stability across all modules.
- Debug logs and ProGuard optimizations.

Updates:
- Default Android SDK upgraded to version 33.
- Added support for exporting projects in signed APK or AAB formats.

Thank you for choosing BlackLogics!

description:
BlackLogics is an advanced Sketchware alternative designed to empower developers and modders with modern tools and better control over their Android projects. It simplifies the development process while offering high-end features like support for Java 1.9 to 11, Kotlin, and XML syntax highlighting. BlackLogics goes beyond basic app building by providing root-powered project automation, real-time optimization, and a fully restructured UI/UX for a professional feel.

It’s built by young, passionate developers from India, and stands as a unique open-source tool tailored for those who want full control, performance, and innovation in one place. Whether you're just starting out or you're already a pro, BlackLogics offers a flexible, stable, and fast environment for building anything—from small apps to large-scale solutions.

With continuous updates, community support via Discord, and contributions from multiple modders, BlackLogics is not just a tool, it’s a movement to redefine mobile app development for everyone.
